title: Enhancing Pulmonary Diagnosis in Chest X-rays through Generative AI Techniques
details: T Sanida, MV Sanida, A Sideris, M Dasygenis - J, 2024
abstract: Chest X-ray imaging is an essential tool in the diagnostic procedure for pulmonary conditions, providing healthcare professionals with the capability to immediately and accurately determine lung anomalies. This imaging modality is fundamental in …
